snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Nasdaq both rose solidly, but the Dow Jones industrial average dropped after Coca-Cola’s reported income and sales fell in the fourth quarter.
abstract: Stock market moves mostly higher, following up on some recent gains; Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rises 2.13 points and Nasdaq gains 28.76 points, but Dow Jones industrial average loses 23.99 points after Coca-Cola’s reported income and sales fell in the fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Nasdaq both rose solidly, but the Dow Jones industrial average dropped after Coca-Cola’s reported income and sales fell in the fourth quarter.

headline.main: Dow Stumbles, but the S.&P. 500 and Nasdaq Continue Their Climb
headline.print_headline: Dow Stumbles, but the S.&P. 500 and Nasdaq Continue Their Climb
